attributes.review:
This app first of all took FOREVER to download!!.
Seconds of all when it did download, it’s was glitching like CRAZY!. And then it would exit out of the app when I try to use it and it would POWER OFF my phone!!. Also while it was downloading o wasn’t able to do ANYTHING ELSE while it was downloading. AND this app SOLD MY INFORMATION!!!!. I DO NOT recommend this app!!!. ITS HORRIBLE!!!!!.
attributes.title: 😤WORST APP EVER!!.😤

attributes.review: When opening the app, i was asked to sacrifice my dog🤔. and i did, because i listen to trump😿. and that was when the news came to use disinfectant on your lungs😬. I did that and died🙀! a few hours later my mom found me and thankfully resurrected me and my mom😸. But, i’m a vampire now😾so if you download this i’ll kill you🤪.
attributes.title: DO NOT download this app.

attributes.review: So AMAZING..... NOT. I downloaded the app and it took like a whole day. When it finally downloaded I opened it and all of a sudden my phone began glitching and then some random dude showed up on my front porch in Trump 2020 merch. I am now terrified for my life and hiding out in my room. If you see this man don’t talk to him if you see him you RUN as fast as humanly possible.

Now I know that many people don’t realize that Donald Trump is a terrible person but after having him ruin the country for four years I can say strongly that I want a new idiot. A better idiot. Cause kinda tried of racists being open and blunt about it. Need to get someone who’s actually going to do anything outside of golf.
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: This app took a week to download and when i opened it it just deleted itself and i had to redownload it. It glitched repeatedly to the point where i couldnt even use it and it did something to my phone because its really slow in loading anything. A more horrible app couldnt be made.
attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: words cannot describe how horrible this app is. it brought my whole family bad luck and we can’t get rid of it! my grandma passed away the morning i downloaded this app and my family has since been in 6 terrible accidents in the last week. my dog ate our rabbit😢 and my lego creation i spent weeks on just BROKE. horrible app. 0/5.
attributes.title: wow.

attributes.review: So i downloaded this app because i love my amazing president trump 😃😄🇺🇸 then when i closed out the app my phone started to play this song called “deepthroat by cupcakke” then a BUG flew out my phone 😱😰😥😓 and my grandma is severely allergic to bugs so she immediately died . rip granny! but overall this app is not good and i do not like donald trump anymore 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: stupid gen z!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever created it doesn’t even work the only time my phone glitches out is when I’m on this app and Donald Trump hasn’t even built the wall yet and doesn’t even make sense for him to be president I think this app should be taken down because this is one of the worst apps I have ever seen on the App Store.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: Gave my phone glitches and i believe they sold my information to telemarketers. I have been getting calls and texts from telemarketers a lot more now then i did before. The more i read on this app the more i realize how terrible of a decision it is to re elect him. He hasn't held up many if his promises as president.
